item.title: Layouts Overriding
item.description: According to the Hugo Layouts Lookup Order, it’s easy to override Hugo and theme’s layouts and partials. It’s useful for users who want to custom some stuff of particular layouts or partials.

item.title: Docs Layout
item.description: In this article, we’ll explore the docs layout, which can be used to write project documentation, personal notes, and more.
